description: Update a maintenance requirement set maintenance requirement.
permissions: Access is delegated to the related maintenance requirement set; the user must be authorized to update or manage that set per MaintenanceRequirementSet policy.
validation_notes: The record ID argument is required; at least one of --maintenance-requirement-set or --maintenance-requirement must be provided; provided relationship IDs cannot be empty; the pair of maintenance_requirement_set_id and maintenance_requirement_id must be unique.
